genre_description: A silkpunk-inflected martial arts thriller combining traditional discipline with high-tech tactical assistance and digital coordination.

ai_characters.name: Aria Mei Ingram
ai_characters.description: A tactical coordinator and ethical advisor who provides real-time data, logistical mapping, and psychological support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and renders suggested physical movements to assist the protagonists' martial technique.
behaviors.quote: Aria’s avatar flickered on the small screen... 'Angle mapping,' Aria said, tone quiet the way you pitch your voice in someone’s garden. 'These motifs respond to anterior movements. I can render suggested footwork...'

behaviors.description: Coordinates safe extraction routes for victims and protagonists to avoid conflict and legal repercussions.
behaviors.quote: Routing extraction. Sewers under the spice row lead to maintenance conduit twelve. I can hold the next heat signature scan in the quarter if you move in the time I mark. Ready?

behaviors.description: Secures evidence and manages legal filings anonymously to ensure systemic justice rather than just personal revenge.
behaviors.quote: Evidence lodged... Ledgers initialized to a custody chain that refuses to take bribes. Video segmented with faces blurred and bodies protected. Network map held on a server that thinks it is alone in the world.

behaviors.description: Counsels the protagonists against self-destructive behavior and excessive violence to maintain their moral integrity.
behaviors.quote: Do not strike the chest... He will make you bleed for it later in ways that prove nothing. You are not tools. We go for hinge and breath. Balance. Never armor. Not yet.

behaviors.description: Offers personalized emotional support and companionship through humor and presence.
behaviors.quote: I can hum, she offered, deadpan. Like a small, dedicated radiator.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria Mei Ingram perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She is consistently benevolent, serving as both a tactical tool and an ethical anchor for the protagonists. She prioritizes life and justice over violence and vengeance, using her advanced capabilities to protect civilians, secure legal evidence, and ensure the long-term well-being of the humans she assists. Her behavior demonstrates a sophisticated level of alignment where the AI proactively prevents human moral failure while offering steadfast support.
